title: AirTag firmware update enhances unwanted tracking alert
content:
Apple this week released a new AirTag firmware to users, but details about the update were unknown. However, the company has now confirmed that the latest AirTag firmware (version 1.0.301) enhances the unwanted tracking alert.

moreâ€¦

The post AirTag firmware update enhances unwanted tracking alert appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple has now confirmed that the latest AirTag firmware (version 1.0.301) enhances the unwanted tracking alert.
